sentences.sContent: This is because their staple food, milkweed, is being used more and more as a garden ornament.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is because their staple food, milkweed, is being used more and more as a garden ornament.
sentences.sCn: 这是因为它们的主要食物乳草被越来越多的用于园林装饰。

trans.tranOther: any plant of the mostly North American genus Asclepias, having milky sap and pointed pods that split open to release tufted seeds: family Asclepiadaceae
